on reading compounds: 溜飲【リュウイン】acid reflux, bile reflux, pyrosis, stomach acid (when it enters the esophagus), heartburn, indigestion, water brash, gloating, gratification, satisfaction
溜飲が下がる【リュウインガサガル】to feel relieved, to feel satisfied
溝溜【コウリュウ】drain and pool for collecting sewage, etc.
貯留【チョリュウ】accumulation, retention, collection, sequestration (as in carbon dioxide sequestration), storage (usually a liquid, e.g. rainwater, or behind a dam.)
kun reading compounds: 溜まる【たまる】to collect, to gather, to save, to accumulate, to pile up
溜まる【たまる】to collect, to gather, to save, to accumulate, to pile up
溜める【ためる】to amass, to accumulate, to store, to leave unpaid
溜まり【たまり】pile, pool, collection, gathering spot, waiting place for a wrestler beside the ring, liquid runoff from miso preparation, tamari, variety of rich soy sauce (used for sashimi, etc.)
溜まり醤油【たまりじょうゆ】tamari soy sauce, variety of rich soy sauce (used for sashimi, etc.)
溜め【ため】cesspool, sink, manure sink
ゴミ溜め【ゴミため】garbage dump, scrap heap, rubbish dump, dump, dumpsite
